entities.name: dark
entities.description: Dark is mentioned as something that the students are likely to meet every other day.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who puts up her hand when asked by Professor Umbridge. She is also mentioned as Miss Granger.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is the teacher who is conducting the class and asking questions to the students.

entities.name: dean thomas
entities.description: Dean Thomas is a student who speaks up in defense of his previous teacher, saying that he was a maniac but they still learned a lot.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is a student whose hand shoots up when asked by Professor Umbridge for her name.

relationships.description: Professor Umbridge scolds Hermione for not having her hand up when asked.
Professor Umbridge scolds Dean Thomas for speaking out of turn and not having his hand up when asked.
Professor Umbridge asks Parvati her name after noticing that her hand is up.
